scripts.compose-database:up: docker-compose -f compose/docker-compose-database.yml down && docker-compose -f compose/docker-compose-database.yml up --build
scripts.compose-development:up: sudo docker-compose -f compose/docker-compose-development.yml down && sudo docker-compose -f compose/docker-compose-development.yml up --build
scripts.compose-local:up: docker-compose -f compose/docker-compose-local.yml down && docker-compose -f compose/docker-compose-local.yml up --build
scripts.docker-build:latest: docker build --force-rm --no-cache -f ~/Projects/Espresso/espresso-backend/source/Espresso.WebApi/Dockerfile -t ipazanin/espresso-webapi:latest --build-arg REACT_APP_ENVIRONMENT="production" ~/Projects/Espresso/espresso-backend/source && docker push ipazanin/espresso-webapi:latest && docker build --force-rm --no-cache -f ~/Projects/Espresso/espresso-backend/source/Espresso.ParserDeleter/Dockerfile -t ipazanin/espresso-parserdeleter:latest ~/Projects/Espresso/espresso-backend/source && docker push ipazanin/espresso-parserdeleter:latest
scripts.migration-add: export ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=local-local-db && dotnet ef migrations add -p source/Espresso.Persistence/Espresso.Persistence.csproj -v
scripts.migration-remove: export ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=local-local-db && dotnet ef migrations remove -p source/Espresso.Persistence/Espresso.Persistence.csproj -v

hooks.pre-commit: cd source/Espresso.WebApi/ClientApp && pretty-quick --staged && yarn lint && yarn test:ci
